titleStmt.title: Remarques relating to the state of the church of the first centuries wherein are intersperst animadversions on J.H.'s View of antiquity.
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: The "View of antiquity" is considered to be by Jonathan Hanmer although it has been erroneously attributed to John Howe and to James Howell--Halkett & Laing and DNB.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
